json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="http">
<prop type="array" name="hosts" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="routes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="headers">
<prop type="array" name="endpointRefs">
<prop type="array" name="tcp">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create

help.short: The geo-location where the resource lives

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http" options="http" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts" options="hosts" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes" options="routes" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes[].match.headers" options="headers">
<arg type="array" var="@NetworkRef_create.endpointRefs" options="endpoint-refs">
<arg type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.tcp" options="tcp" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="http" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http">
<prop type="array" name="hosts" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="routes" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="headers" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes[].match.headers">
<prop type="array" name="endpointRefs" arg="@NetworkRef_create.endpointRefs">
<prop type="array" name="tcp" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.tcp">

<prop type="array" name="http">
<prop type="array" name="hosts" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="routes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="headers">
<prop type="array" name="endpointRefs">
<prop type="array" name="tcp">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http" options="http" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts" options="hosts">
<arg type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes" options="routes">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes[].match.headers" options="headers">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@NetworkRef_update.endpointRefs" options="endpoint-refs">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.tcp" options="tcp" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="http">
<prop type="array" name="hosts" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="routes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="headers">
<prop type="array" name="endpointRefs">
<prop type="array" name="tcp">

<prop type="array" name="http" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http">
<prop type="array" name="hosts" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="routes" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="headers" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.http[].hosts[].routes[].match.headers">
<prop type="array" name="endpointRefs" arg="@NetworkRef_update.endpointRefs">
<prop type="array" name="tcp" arg="$gatewayResourceDescription.properties.tcp">
